title: New: aywy. – Need U
body:
Sydney producer [**aywy.**](https://www.

facebook.com/AofficialY) just dropped his **Valentine’s EP** to honour the day of lovers, featuring these four essential tracks of magic. EP highlight **Need U** is a passionate R&B jam moving with a sensual groove and impressiving with its flawless production and ever-so vulnerable sampled soulful vocals. Stream it below and get the whole EP for free [over here](https://flowfi.bandcamp.com/album/feels).
